segments.text: Well , your qualifications for the job are excellent . And is there anything you'd like to ask about the job ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , I'd like to know if the company provides opportunities for further education .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes , our employees are allowed to take up 2 days a month to attend college courses .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I've enjoyed the conversation with you . We'll call you within 5 working days .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Thank you . I appreciate the time you've given to me .
segments.speaker: S2
